title: A  Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled Multi-Center Study of PDK-277 (dopamine agonist) in Patients With Duchenne Muscular Dystrophy
officialTitle: A  Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled Multi-Center Study of PDK-277 (dopamine agonist) in Patients With Duchenne Muscular Dystrophy
description: This is a  double-blind, placebo-controlled multi-center study designed to evaluate the efficacy and safety of PDK-277 (dopamine agonist) in patients with Duchenne Muscular Dystrophy. The study will enroll approximately 129 patients.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Adults aged 18-58 years
- Confirmed diagnosis of Duchenne Muscular Dystrophy
- ECOG performance status 0-1
- Adequate organ function
- Willing and able to provide informed consent

Exclusion Criteria:
- Known hypersensitivity to study drug or excipients
- Pregnant or breastfeeding women
- Participation in another interventional study within 30 days
- Significant cardiovascular disease within past 6 months
- Active or chronic infection requiring systemic treatment
